content:
I called for Cupid's help today to melt your icy heart.
But he would not (or could not) even play his part.

His quiver was quite empty, with not one arrow left.
He shrugged his dimpled shoulders, leaving me bereft!

He wouldn't look me in the eye; he wore an ugly frown.
He acted in the strangest way - flying upside down!

He really was no help at all. I hardly think it fair.
I've come to the conclusion that Cupid doesn't care!

__________
cleaned: i called cupid s help today melt your icy heart but he would not or could not even play his part his quiver was quite empty with not one arrow left he shrugged his dimpled shoulders leaving me bereft he wouldn t look me the eye he wore an ugly frown he acted the strangest way flying upside down he really was no help all i hardly think it fair i ve come the conclusion that cupid doesn t care
